revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WA7510N |revision=v1.x |asin=B006TTELPG
|manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=common |type=outdoor access point |fcc_date=01/11/2013 |fcc_id=TE7WA7510N |ic_id=8853A-WA7510N |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9280 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=high power |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=an |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|150Mbps Outdoor 5GHz Wireless Access Point}} :[https://www.tp-link.com/en/business-networking/outdoor-radio/tl-wa7510n/ Product page]
High power Wireless Access Point, WISP Client Router, up to 27dBm, Atheros, :5Ghz 802.11a/n, High Sensitivity, Integrated 15dBi directional antenna
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa7510n On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=164661 On '''DD-WRT''' forum] :also known as [[Planet WNAP-7206]].. <!--"CA-F121", "1301172750-1.0", and "Rev:1.1sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Additional specifications, per '''TP-LINK''''s datasheet, follow... *Power Consumption: about 3W *EIRP: < 20 dBm *Receive Sensitivity **130M: -68 dBm @ 10% PER **108M: -68 dBm @ 10% PER **54M: -68 dBm @ 10% PER **11M: -85 dBm @ 8% PER **6M: -88 dBm @ 10% PER **1M: -90 dBm @ 8% PER *Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::110 mm x 65.8 mm x 75.2 mm]]--> Default settings (including the SSID) are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1876012 FCC] and '''TP-LINK''''s manual.
